WALK-IN (WRITTEN TEST) FOR GRADUATE APPRENTICESHIP TRAINING 
         Bharat  Electronics  Limited  (BEL)  is  a  multi  product,  multi  unit,  Navaratna  PSU 
under the Ministry of Defence and India’s Premier professional Electronics Company. 
BEL  manufactures  State-Of-The-Art  Electronic  Products  and  Systems  for  the  Army, 
Navy  and  Air  Force.  Also,  BEL  manufactures  Electronic  Voting  Machines,  Telecom 
Products, Ventilators, Radars, Military Equipment’s etc. 
BEL, Bengaluru is holding Walk-In (Written Test) for Engineering Graduates for 
Graduate Apprenticeship Training under Apprenticeship (Amendment) Act 1973.

ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA: 
1. Candidate’s  domicile  must  be  from  Southern  Region  (Karnataka,  Tamil  Nadu, 
Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Kerala & Pondicherry) only. 
2.
 Candidate  should  possess  a  Engineering/Technology  Graduation  from  a 
recognized Board/University on or after 01-01-2021.  
3.
 Candidate’s  upper  age  limit  is  25  years.  Relaxation  of  5  years  for  SC  &  ST 
candidates. Relaxation of 3 years for OBC candidates and 10 years for Persons 
with disabilities. 
4. Minimum  Percentage  in  Graduation  for  General  &  OBC candidates  should  be 
60% & above. For SC/ST candidates minimum Percentage in Graduation should 
be 50% & above.

SELECTION PROCESS: 
1. Selection is purely on the basis of merit based on marks secured in the written 
test. 
 
DOCUMENTS TO BE PROVIDED FOR VERIFICATION (ORIGINALS): 
1. SSLC Marks Card/10
th

2. Degree Certificate/Provisional Degree Certificate (PDC) 
3. Aadhar Card 
4. SC/ST/OBC/PWD Certificates (If Applicable) 
 
 
FACILITIES PROVIDED TO APPRENTICES: 
1. Stipend paid during the training is `17,500 /- (Rupees Seventeen Thousand & 
Five  Hundred  only)  per  month.  Wherein, 
`13,000/-  will  be  paid  by  BEL  &            
` 4,500/- will be paid by Govt. through Direct Beneficiary Transfer (DBT).  
2.
 Canteen and Transport facilities will be available on chargeable basis. 
3. Free OPD Medical facilities at BEL hospital as per Company norms. 
4. Free Group Personal Accident Insurance (GPAI) policy for sum insured of Rs. 
5.00 Lakhs.
